name: 賀一平
objective:
本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。
This course aims to develop students' skills in performing selected types of professional written discourse (e.g., resumes, proposals, meeting minutes). Various opportunities for students to collaborate with their classmates will also be provided as they will often be required to do so in an actual workplace. With sufficient practice, students will finish this class with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in written forms.
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation
Week 2: Application Letters
Week 3: Resumes
Week 4: Autobiography
Week 5: Request Letters
Week 6: Replies
Week 7: Letters of Complaint, Adjustment, and Apology
Week 8: Letters of Congratulation and Appreciation 
Week 9: Midterm Examination 
Week 10: Sales and Public Relations Letters
Week 11: Social Business Letters
Week 12: Letters of Acceptance, Letters of  Resignation
Week 13: Proposals and Reports
Week 14: Technical Reports
Week 15: Technical Reports
Week 16: Statements of Purpose (Study Plan)
Week 17: Review
Week 18: Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Class Participation & Attendance: 25% 
Midterm exam 15%
Final exam 15%
Assignments: 45%
